changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_guild_skill') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_skill GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_skill @guild_id dbo.id_t, @skill_code dbo.code_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Skills WHERE guild_id = @guild_id AND skill_code = @skill_code
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_guild_skill') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_skill GO
